attributes.review: This app was so terrible that bad doesn't even begin to describe it! It kept glitching and closing when i tried to open it!! Don't waste your time on this app!! Not to mention it kept asking to put in my information after i already did so. It was completely useless!
attributes.title: worst app!!

attributes.review: Y’all really support this man enough for him to make an APP? This is disgusting and not to mention the app only brought me bad luck 😣. As soon as I opened it I was force feed racist, homophobic, xenophobic, sexist, misogynistic and narcissistic information that did not benefit me in any way shape or form. attributes.title: Disgrace to Mankind

attributes.review: this app was so terrible that I had to use 4 different languages to describe it. My goldfish died the moment I got on the app and my 4 year old started having a tantrum. I don’t even have kids because I am unable to. This app caused me to be infertile and I will never have kids :(. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS IF YOU WANT A KID!! OR EVEN IF YOU WERE A KID ONCE!! ALL KIDS MATTER except for lil shrimpy here.
attributes.title: terrible  жудасны forfærdeligt príšerný

attributes.review: This app destroyed my phone it literally almost blew up as it downloaded for hours. Just looking at it you can tell that it’s filled with hateful and non-Christian information, it’s pretty anti-biblical. This “app” and the Cheeto who runs it remind me of a system of religious veneration and devotion directed toward a particular figure or object (cult). Yikes. Definitely don’t download.
attributes.title: Not a vibe

attributes.review: This app was utterly terrible for the most part. It glitched all the time and I couldn’t even do what I wanted. Either way I don’t like trump, he’s nasty and this app has to be the worst of all time to be honest. I have never witnessed so much disgust in an app and I find it funny that this “president” Mr. Orange has launched something like this!
attributes.title: disgusting and slow

attributes.review: This app not only tried to hack into my social media’s but when I say the horrifying, graphic pictures of Donald Trump I had a mental breakdown from the trauma this app put me through. Not only should this app be banned but it should be erased from history just like trump. Children under 12 will have serious PTSD if downloaded.
attributes.title: Despicable

attributes.review: This app very much disgusted me it took up half the storage in my phone it took 2 hours to download it started playing music out of no where it gave my phone a virus’s big I hade to go to the Apple to help me get it fix I do not recommend this app you be better off getting a game app then this
attributes.title: Do not get this app🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: This app literally took dats to download and was glitching as soon as I got it. I had to restart my phone so many time because it actually broken my screen. My other apps worked just fine and didn’t have a problem. This app is not well made at ALL and need to be taken down.
